name: its snowing inside
description:
made in its entirety while listening to this album once https://everydayago.bandcamp.com/album/i-heard-the-sound-of-violence-far-off
please listen to the album while playing, though if you want you can stop playing and just continue listening at any point, but come back to the tab once you are finished the album.

See if you can make it snow inside

I may eventually update this game to be more of a normal  game, or release more episodes or something

controls:

  • wasd to navigate the wired
  • scroll wheel to adjust the frost on your monitor
